IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: UC HASTINGS FOUNDATION GENERATES AND RECEIVES GIFTS IN SUPPORT OF UC HASTINGS COLLEGE OF THE LAW.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROVIDE AN ORGANIZATION FOR INDIVIDUALS AND ORGANIZATIONS WHO ARE DEDICATED TO THE SUPPORT OF THE UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA, HASTINGS COLLEGE OF THE LAW ("COLLEGE"), AND TO PROVIDE A MEANS FOR SOLICITING, RECEIVING, AND MAKING DONATIONS, FINANCIAL, AND OTHER CONTRIBUTIONS.
IRS990.Desc: INSTITUTIONAL SUPPORT: PROVIDED GRANTS TO UC HASTINGS COLLEGE OF THE LAW TO ENRICH THE ACADEMIC PROGRAM AND PROVIDE FOR OPPORTUNITIES IN LEGAL EDUCATION THAT WOULD OTHERWISE NOT OCCUR WITHOUT PRIVATE SUPPORT. THE TWO LARGEST BLOCK GRANTS PROVIDE FOR THE FUNDRAISING AND THE ALUMNI OUTREACH OPERATIONS AT THE COLLEGE. OVER 50 EVENTS AND PRINT MATERIALS (SUCH AS THE DONOR ANNUAL REPORTS AND REUNIONS) WERE DELIVERED. THE BLOCK GRANTS WERE USED FOR ALL FUNDRAISING SOLICITATIONS AND DONOR RELATIONS THROUGHOUT THE YEAR.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: STUDENT SCHOLARSHIPS & LOANS: FUNDED THE BRIDGE FELLOWS PROGRAM, AND SMALLER PROGRAMS SUCH AS MOOT COURT, JOURNAL AWARDS, ETC.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: VARIOUS STUDENT SERVICES: PROVIDE SCHOLARSHIP AND LOAN FUNDS FOR STUDENTS, RESEARCH GRANTS FOR FACULTY, AND OTHER GRANTS FOR VARIOUS PROGRAMS OF UC HASTINGS COLLEGE OF THE LAW.

OtherSecuritiesGrp.Desc: INVESTMENTS IN UC HASTINGS GEP OPERATING FUND

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: UC HASTINGS - COLLEGE OF THE LAW

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FOR GRANTS TO ORGANIZATIONS, THE FOUNDATION RECEIVES REPORTS FROM UC HASTINGS COLLEGE OF THE LAW, THE GRANT RECEIVING ENTITY AND RELATED ORGANIZATION, REGARDING USE OF THE FUNDS. GRANTS TO INDIVIDUALS ARE NOT MONITORED, AS THE GRANTED AMOUNTS ARE UNRESTRICTED AND UNCONDITIONAL.
THE ORGANIZATION IS REPORTING THE NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTIONS, RATHER THAN THE NUMBER OF ITEMS CONTRIBUTED, IN SCHEDULE M, PART I, COLUMN (B).

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ROBERT FREITAS AND JESSICA LEAL HAVE A BUSINESS RELATIONSHIP.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE UC HASTINGS BOARD OF DIRECTORS CAN SELECT AND REMOVE 50% PLUS 1 OF THE FOUNDATION'S AUTHORIZED VOTING TRUSTEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NO AMENDMENT TO THE ORGANIZATION'S BYLAWS THAT AFFECTS, OR IS INCONSISTENT WITH, THE OPERATING AGREEMENT BETWEEN UC HASTINGS AND UC HASTINGS FOUNDATION IS EFFECTIVE WITHOUT THE PRIOR WRITTEN APPROVAL OF UC HASTINGS BY ACTION OF THE UC HASTINGS BOARD; ADDITIONALLY, THE UC HASTINGS FOUNDATION WORKS JOINTLY WITH UC HASTINGS TO PREPARE ANY AMENDMENTS TO THE FOUNDATION'S BYLAWS AND ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AFTER REVIEW BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES, THE IRS FORM 990 WAS DISTRIBUTED ELECTRONICALLY TO THE FULL BOARD FOR ITS REVIEW. UPON REVIEW AND COMMENT BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES, THE FORM 900 WAS SUBMITTED TO THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: UC HASTINGS FOUNDATION UTILIZES THE UC HASTINGS COLLEGE OF THE LAW'S CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. TRUSTEES ARE REQUIRED TO DISCLOSE ANY INTEREST THAT COULD GIVE RISE TO CONFLICT. THE FOUNDATION MANDATES THAT ANY INTEREST THAT COULD GIVE RISE TO CONFLICT BE IMMEDIATELY PRESENTED TO THE BOARD FOR REVIEW. ENFORCEMENT OF THIS POLICY IS ONGOING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.

DisregardedEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: UC HASTINGS - COLLEGE OF THE LAW
